definitions.definition: Having a great extent ; covering a large area; vast .

examples: I have done extensive research on the subject.

definitions.definition: Serving to extend or lengthen ; characterized by extension .
Having a combined system entropy that equals the sum of the entropies of the independent systems.

main_definition: Having a great extent ; covering a large area; vast .
secondary_definitions: Serving to extend or lengthen ; characterized by extension .
( physics ) Having a combined system entropy that equals the sum of the entropies of the independent systems.
